CasualDialog: Talking to yourself is usually pointless.
Much as you're a wonderful conversationalist, there's not much point.
You'd rather not. Other ponies think you're weird enough as it is.

Descriptions.default: You are the Great and Powerful Trixie! You are Equestria's greatest stage magician, a unicorn of peerless beauty and magical ability, a brave and fearless hero, and also very humble.
Descriptions.unicorn: You are a blue unicorn with a silvery mane.
Descriptions.human: You are a human teenager with blue skin, silver hair, and gangly long limbs. Your horn seems to have disappeared in the change, which is worrisome...

AskTopics.default: You're not the type of pony to question yourself.

CasualDialog: She looks at you with a frown. "Oh... hello, Trixie."
"Do you want something?"
"Please don't bother me while I'm busy."
"I'm sure Starlight is around here somewhere."
"No, I won't teach you the 'Want it, Need it' spell. Stop asking."

Descriptions.default: You're mostly over your issues with Twilight Sparkle, the princess of friendship and books and obnoxious... mostly.
Descriptions.alicorn: She's a purple alicorn with a striped mane and large wings. You think she's a bit taller than she used to be, too. How annoying.
Descriptions.human: She is a gangly human with purple skin and oversized boots. Seriously, why is she wearing those things?
Descriptions.sleeping: She is sleeping peacefully, occasionally mumbling in her sleep.

AskTopics.magic: "You'll have to be more specific, Trixie. It's kind of my speciality. Is there a specific spell you want to know about?"
AskTopics.default: "I'm not quite sure. Can I look it up later?"
AskTopics.alicorn amulet: "Princess Celestia took care of it, Trixie. You're not getting it back."
AskTopics.teleportation: "Teleportation allows you to move things, including yourself, anywhere else you can imagine. I'm actually impressed you can do it... it's not something just anypony can master."
AskTopics.transformation: "Transformation allows you to turn things into other things. Now if you could create something other than teacups..."

CasualDialog: "Hello, Trixie."
"Yes, dear?"
"Please. I'm 'in the zone' at the moment."
"Do you want something? A new outfit?"
"If you set off another smoke bomb in here, I WILL tell Starlight."

Descriptions.default: Ponyville's resident fashion pony. Really melodramatic and self-obsessed, in your opinion.

AskTopics.default: "Oh, I really don't know anything about that."
AskTopics.alicorn amulet: "As reprehensible as it was tasteless. I can think of nicer things for you to wear."

CasualDialog: "Hi Trixie!"
"Yeah? You want something? You want me to throw you a party?"
"Hey, what's your favorite flavor? Blueberry? Chocolate? Chili pepper? Nooo reason..."
"Sometimes I like to go WHEEEE! for no reason at all! You know what I'm talking about?"
"I think the programmer is trying to come up with new things for me to say."

Descriptions.default: Ponyville's premier party pony. A total weirdo. Frankly, she unnerves you.

AskTopics.alicorn amulet: "Uh, it's evil and nasty and we like you better when you're not going crazy and evil and stuff?"

CasualDialog: "Hey there, Trixie."
"You want somethin'?"
"For the love o' Celestia, don't cause another mess."
She snorts. "Unlike some ponies, I'm too darn busy to stand around gawkin'."
"Y'wanna make yerself useful? fetch me a... aw, forgot who I was talkin' to."

Descriptions.earth pony: She is an orange earth pony with a blonde mane tied into a practical ponytail.
Descriptions.default: A down-to-earth apple farmer and general rustic country bumpkin. Boring, but fairly nice.

AskTopics.alicorn amulet: "You wanna start that kinda nonsense again?"
AskTopics.self: "Me? Shucks, I don't wanna brag, but I'm an honest apple farmer. Me an' my family run Sweet Apple Acres."

CasualDialog: "Oh, hey."
"When did you get here?"
"Hey, can you do fireworks on demand?"
"Zzzzz... uh? Huh?"
"I'm soooo bored."

Descriptions.default: One of the most arrogant and loudmouthed ponies you've ever known. Nice to have on your side, though.

AskTopics.alicorn amulet: "Now why'd you have to go and bring that up again?"

CasualDialog: Fluttershy looks away bashfully.
"Um. Yes? D-do you want something?"
"I... um... nevermind." *squeak*
"Trixie, I... I... nevermind."

Descriptions.default: A meek and shy pegasus who spends most of her time keeping animals. Also has some thing with Discord? She puzzles you.

AskTopics.default: "Um... sorry, I don't know anything about that."
AskTopics.alicorn amulet: Fluttershy's eyes widen, and she shakes in fear. You quickly try to change the subject.
AskTopics.animals: Fluttershy immediately gets excited. "Oh, I love animals! Fluffy bunnies and singing birds and big cuddly bears, and did you know..." She soon loses herself in a lengthy elaboration that you have no interest in.

CasualDialog: "What do you want?"
"Please tell me you're not going to break stuff again."
"Oh... I think I've got stuff to do. Elsewhere."
"Starlight's in the library, I think. Go bother her."
"Uh, yeah?"

Descriptions.default: Twilight Sparkle's runty dragon assistant. He's kind of annoying.

AskTopics.alicorn amulet: "Oh, no no no. You're not getting that thing back."

CasualDialog: "Oh, hi, Trixie!"
"I didn't know you were back in town."
"So what have you been up to lately? Anything exciting?"
"Wanna hang out later? We could work on magic or something. You choose."
"You haven't been bothering Twilight, have you?"

Descriptions.default: Starlight Glimmer is your best friend. She's talented, understanding, fun... and she knows what it's like to have a troubled past. She's the best.

AskTopics.alicorn amulet: "No, Trixie. NO. Twilight told me about that. You're NOT going to play around with evil artifacts again, you hear?"

CasualDialog: "Trixie. Hello."
"Do you want something?"
"I seem to have misplaced my chisel..."
"Seen any good rocks lately?"

Descriptions.default: Maud Pie is... strange.  In some ways she's even weirder than Pinkie Pie. Are they really sisters? At least she doesn't judge you.
Descriptions.sleeping: She is sleeping like a rock.

CasualDialog: "Hello, my little pony."
"Trixie, hmm? I've heard about you. Don't worry, they're good things. Well, mostly good things."
"Do you like bananas?"
"You're a bit of a troublemaker, aren't you? Equestria needs ponies like you, too."
Celestia smiles warmly at you. "Yes?"

Descriptions.default: The Princess of the Sun, diarch of Equestria. It's one of your dreams to one day get to perform at her court.

AskTopics.default: "Oh dear, I can't really help you with that. Have you tried asking somepony more knowledgeable about the subject?"
AskTopics.alicorn amulet: "Don't worry, it's safely locked away where it can't hurt anypony again." She gives you a pointed look. "Let's not talk about that anymore."

CasualDialog: "GREET... *ahem* greetings, faithful subject."
"We recognize you... you're that pony who sends all the fan letters, correct?"
"How may we be of assistance, citizen?"
"Ah, the Great and Powerful Trixie. We've... heard of you."
"I really should be getting some sleep. Busy night, you know."

Descriptions.default: The Princess of the Moon, diarch of Equestria. You've always felt a certain kinship with her, and her plight. She keeps the night safe.

AskTopics.alicorn amulet: "'Tis an evil, evil thing. You should not concern yourself about it, little pony."

CasualDialog: "Well, if it isn't Trixie!"
"Hmm. Care to assist me in a prank later? I could use a patsy... I mean, partner."
"Wait, are we in a game now? Splendid!"
"No, I'm not going to lend you my powers of chaos, no matter how fun that'd be. Fluttershy is still upset about the last time."
Discord grins and snaps his claw. You don't know what he might have done, but you should worry.

Descriptions.default: The grand Chaos Noodle himself. Weird, obnoxious, egocentric, annoying... okay, sometimes he's kind of fun, but don't let him hear that.

AskTopics.default: "Oh, the things I could tell you! But I won't. Because it's more fun this way."
AskTopics.alicorn amulet: "Such a nice little toy! But, ah, I don't think anypony should DIG it up again. It could cause... trouble.

CasualDialog: "Going somewhere today, ma'am?"
"Let me know if you want a ticket somewhere, ma'am."
"Don't you usually have your own wagon, Miss Trixie?"
"Keep all hooves, wings, horns and other appendages inside the train until it's reached a full stop"
"The train to Klugetown has been cancelled today. Bandits. Again."

Descriptions.default: An authoritative-looking pony who sells tickets and stops freeloaders. His moustache is quite impressive.

AskTopics.default: "Sorry, ma'am, don't know. I just sell tickets and work the trains."
AskTopics.tickets: "Just let me know where you want to go."

Descriptions.default: A dangerous creature from the Everfree Forest. It looks like a wolf made out of twigs and branches.
Descriptions.onfire: It's furiously trying to put out the fire in its foliage.

CasualDialog: "What do you want, Trixie?"
"I'm late, I'm late, I'm late!"
"Hey, Trixie."
"Excuse me..."
The student is too busy listening into a small square to notice you.

Descriptions.default: An assortment of students attending Canterlot High. They come in all kinds and colors and you really can't keep track of them.

AskTopics.default: They yammer a bit. It seems nobody has anything useful to say.
